Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Recently , p - aminophenol ( PAP ) , a known potent nephrotoxicant , was identified as a metabolite of APAP in F344 rats .

Sure! Here are the entities in the paragraph that correspond to the concept of "Disease":

2. Nephrotoxicity: The property of being harmful to the kidneys.

1. Nephrotoxicant
2. Nephrotoxicity
